title: Drew Barrymore and 'The Talk' postpone their shows until after the Hollywood strikes
description: Barrymore's initial decision to return to the air Monday was met with pushback on social media and a revoked invite to host the National Book Awards.

title: Rolling Stone founder Jann Wenner under fire for comments on female, Black rockers
description: The notable music journalist has been removed from the Rock & Roll Hall of Fame Foundation, the organization announced.

title: Forecasters cancel warnings as Lee begins to dissipate over Maritime Canada
description: A 51-year-old motorist in Searsport, Maine, died in the storm Saturday after a large tree limb fell on his vehicle.

title: Thousands expected to march in New York to demand that Biden 'end fossil fuels'
description: The protest comes after a summer of extreme weather events and just ahead of a U.N. summit aimed at prodding global leaders to cut emissions more quickly.

title: Snow, scorpions, Dr. Seuss: What Kenyan kids talked about with top U.S. kids' authors
description: Newbery prize winners Kwame Alexander, a poet, and Jerry Craft, an author and illustrator, went on a mission to Kenya to encourage reading. The kids learned a lot. So did the authors.

title: How Shawn Fain, an unlikely and outspoken president, led the UAW to strike
description: The former union electrician was an underdog in recent UAW leadership elections, but with a tough love approach to auto companies in negotiations, he narrowly won. Now he's taking the union on strike.

title: She chased 'ego death' — first in religion, then in parenthood
description: Jia Tolentino has a nuanced perspective on her religious upbringing and her subsequent rejection of that belief system. And then what it meant to become a parent.

title: Poison ivy is poised to be one of the big winners of a warming world
description: Rising temperatures and carbon dioxide levels give the toxic vine the oomph it needs to grow earlier, bigger and itchier, scientists say.

title: Biden is meeting with leaders from Israel, Brazil, Ukraine and the "Stans" this week
description: President Biden will hold a series of talks with world leaders this week around UN meetings — including a first-ever summit with Kazakhstan, Kyrgyzstan, Tajikistan, Turkmenistan, and Uzbekistan.

title: Past impeachments, products of their times, often produced unintended consequences
description: Previous instances of presidential impeachment have each had contexts unique to their own political moments. These considerations have mattered as much as the alleged "high crimes and misdemeanors."
